channel.title: How to Add a Portal?
channel.description: OK, I have been running my server for about 2 months now, and I have been having some trouble with the same problem. I am currently in the process of making a new home area, and I need one last thing to make it perfect. I need to add a portal. I understand how to create it in client.java, it's just that I can never find the right ID to use. Or does it really matter? However, then I go into client.java after re-compiling the spawned portal, but the ID I used is already in use, and I can't find any coordinates anywhere near the portal ID. Someone please help me, greatly appreciated.

item.title: How to Add a Portal?
item.dc:creator: @Rump_Ranger93 Rump Ranger93
item.description:
@Rump_Ranger93 wrote:

[quote=“SkillersDream, post:10, topic:244831”][quote author=guitars595 link=topic=321239.msg2543787#msg2543787 date=1227141015]
Its called a search bar. Get to know her.
[/quote]
“search bar” isnt a her or him. is a shemale. also hes figured it out…[/quote]

AGREED! THIS NEW THING IS GOING AROUND TELLING EVERYONE TO USE THE SEARCH BAR. ITS NOT THAT HELPFUL, PISS OFF IF YOU DONT KNOW THE ANSWER AND DONT WASTE YOUR TIME POSTING “us teh saerch baer n3ob pl0x!”

item.title: How to Add a Portal?
item.dc:creator: @mr_luigi_77 mr luigi 77
item.description:
@mr_luigi_77 wrote:

The code I used was: 7319
But that is used for the Barrows portal.
I want to set new coords or need a portal ID that my server doesn’t have.
But in client.java I see no coords.
Btw, gratz on un-muted Tony
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 01:51:28 pm[/size][hr]Oh, my bad, I figured out how to do it. I was trying to spawn the portal in the wrong folder. Thanks for making me look over my work Tony, you’re awesome!

Read full topic

then find a portal code let it teleport with a code…i’ve seen around here a tutorial about that, look around.[/quote]
If you haven’t read it, he knows how.

And Mr. Luigi, post the code you used please.
